branding.tagline: Gain deeper insights with machine learning.

CONNECTION_NAME.label: LookML Constant: BigQuery Connection Name
CONNECTION_NAME.description: The BigQuery connection the application will be allowed to use. Must be the same connection as chosen below.

bigquery_connection_name.label: BigQuery Connection Name
bigquery_connection_name.description: The BigQuery connection the application will be allowed to use. Must be the same connection as chosen above.

gcp_project.label: GCP Project ID
gcp_project.description: The GCP project ID for the BigQuery dataset where ML models will be saved.

bqml_model_dataset_name.label: BQML Model Dataset Name
bqml_model_dataset_name.description: The dataset where ML models will be saved. Create a new dataset for BQML models (recommended) or choose the same dataset used for Looker PDTs.

generate_text_model_name.label: GenAI Text Model Name
generate_text_model_name.description: Name of an LLM model to generate text summaries (optional feature). Must be in same dataset as above. See https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/generate-text for setup instructions.
